text: ye sab ke sab milakar bhee tumase nahin lad sakate, magar har taraph se mahaphooz bastiyon mein ya (shahar panaah kee) deevaaron kee aad mein inakee aapas mein to badee dhaak hai ki tum khyaal karoge ki sab ke sab (ek jaan) hain magar unake dil ek doosare se phate hue hain ye is vajah se ki ye log beakl hain
